short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monitor LinkedIn posts for specific phrases with ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This app makes it easy to track important phrases on LinkedIn, helping with marketing, finding leads, or searching for jobs. Instead of manually searching, save your key phrases and get instant updates when new posts appear. Perfect for staying on top of opportunities, cutting down time, and never missing an important post again!
